name: s3-url
author: Izaak Schroeder <izaak.schroeder@gmail.com>
description: Go between URLs and AWS options objects for S3.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run spec && npm run coverage
scripts.spec: NODE_PATH=lib NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -r test/helpers/chai -R spec test/spec
